articles.author: Catherine Bosley, Matthew Burgess
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for June 24 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian equities fell as traders geared up for a week of political risks and inflation data which may help guide bets on the outlook for global interest rates.
articles.content:
Asian equities fell as traders geared up for a week of political risks and inflation data which may help guide bets on the outlook for global interest rates.
